---
title: "two column test"
---

```{=html}
<style>
  .container {
    display: flex;
  }
  .left-column {
    width: 30%;
    padding: 10px;
  }
  .right-column {
    width: 70%;
    padding: 10px;
  }
</style>
```

::::: container
<!-- Left Column -->

::: left-column
```         
<h2>About Me</h2>
<p>Some text about yourself goes here.</p>
<h3>Links</h3>
<ul>
  <li><a href="https://example.com"Link 1</a></li>
  <li><a href="https://example.com"Link 2</a></li>
  <li><a href="https://example.com"Link 3</a></li>
</ul>
```
:::

<!-- Right Column -->

::: right-column
```         
<h2>Projects</h2>

<div class="project">
  <h3>Project 1</h3>
  <img src="path/to/image1.jpg" alt="Project 1 Image" style="width:100%; max-width:400px;">
  <p>Description of Project 1.</p>
  <a href="https://example.com/project1"Learn More</a>
</div>

<div class="project">
  <h3>Project 2</h3>
  <img src="path/to/image2.jpg" alt="Project 2 Image" style="width:100%; max-width:400px;">
  <p>Description of Project 2.</p>
  <a href="https://example.com/project2"Learn More</a>
</div>
```
:::
